pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴巴张开，发音类似中文的'啊'，但更短促
pronunciation_tips.ja: 口を大きく開けて、短く「あ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Open your mouth wide and pronounce like 'ah' but shorter

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴角向两边拉开，发音类似中文的'衣'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 口角を横に引いて「い」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Stretch the corners of your mouth and pronounce like 'ee'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴唇稍微突出，发音类似中文的'乌'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を少し突き出して「う」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Slightly protrude your lips and pronounce like 'oo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴巴半开，发音类似中文的'诶'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 口を半分開けて「え」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Half-open your mouth and pronounce like 'eh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似中文的'哦'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 口を丸くして「お」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Make your mouth round and pronounce like 'oh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，发音类似中文的'卡'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて「か」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate, like 'ka'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，嘴角拉开，发音类似中文的'ki'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて口角を引いて「き」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate with mouth corners stretched, like 'kee'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，嘴唇突出，发音类似中文的'库'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて唇を突き出して「く」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate with protruded lips, like 'koo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，嘴巴半开，发音类似中文的'ke'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて口を半分開けて「け」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate with half-open mouth, like 'keh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似中文的'ko'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて口を丸くして「こ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate with round mouth, like 'koh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，发音类似中文的'sa'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて「さ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums, like 'sah'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接近上齿龈，发音类似中文的'xi'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎に近づけて「し」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Bring the tip of your tongue close to the upper gums, like 'shee'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴唇稍微突出，发音类似中文的'su'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて唇を少し突き出して「す」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with slightly protruded lips, like 'soo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴半开，发音类似中文的'se'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を半分開けて「せ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with half-open mouth, like 'seh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似中文的'so'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を丸くして「そ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with round mouth, like 'soh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，发音类似中文的'ta'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて「た」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums, like 'tah'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接近上齿龈，发音类似中文的'qi'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎に近づけて「ち」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Bring the tip of your tongue close to the upper gums, like 'chee'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，发音类似中文的'cu'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて「つ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums, like 'tsoo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴半开，发音类似中文的'te'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を半分開けて「て」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with half-open mouth, like 'teh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似中文的'to'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を丸くして「と」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with round mouth, like 'toh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，发音类似中文的'na'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて「な」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums, like 'nah'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴角拉开，发音类似中文的'ni'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口角を引いて「に」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with mouth corners stretched, like 'nee'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴唇稍微突出，发音类似中文的'nu'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて唇を少し突き出して「ぬ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with slightly protruded lips, like 'noo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴半开，发音类似中文的'ne'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を半分開けて「ね」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with half-open mouth, like 'neh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似中文的'no'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を丸くして「の」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with round mouth, like 'noh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，发音类似中文的'ha'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて「は」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips together, like 'hah'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴角拉开，发音类似中文的'hi'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口角を引いて「ひ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with mouth corners stretched, like 'hee'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴唇稍微突出，发音类似中文的'fu'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて少し突き出して「ふ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with slightly protruded lips, like 'foo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴巴半开，发音类似中文的'he'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口を半分開けて「へ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with half-open mouth, like 'heh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似中文的'ho'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口を丸くして「ほ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with round mouth, like 'hoh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇闭合，发音类似中文的'ma'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を閉じて「ま」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Close your lips and pronounce like 'mah'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇闭合，嘴角拉开，发音类似中文的'mi'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を閉じて口角を引いて「み」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Close your lips with mouth corners stretched, like 'mee'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇闭合，嘴唇稍微突出，发音类似中文的'mu'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を閉じて少し突き出して「む」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Close your lips with slightly protruded lips, like 'moo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇闭合，嘴巴半开，发音类似中文的'me'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を閉じて口を半分開けて「め」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Close your lips with half-open mouth, like 'meh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇闭合，嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似中文的'mo'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を閉じて口を丸くして「も」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Close your lips with round mouth, like 'moh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴巴张开，舌面抬高，发音类似中文的'ya'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 口を開けて舌の表面を上げて「や」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Open your mouth, raise the surface of your tongue, like 'yah'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴唇稍微突出，舌面抬高，发音类似中文的'you'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を少し突き出して舌の表面を上げて「ゆ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Slightly protrude your lips, raise the surface of your tongue, like 'yoo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴巴呈圆形，舌面抬高，发音类似中文的'yo'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 口を丸くして舌の表面を上げて「よ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Make your mouth round, raise the surface of your tongue, like 'yoh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖轻弹上齿龈，发音类似英文的'la'但更轻快
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎に軽く弾いて「ら」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly tap the tip of your tongue against the upper gums, like a light 'la'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖轻弹上齿龈，嘴角拉开，发音类似英文的'lee'但更轻快
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎に軽く弾いて口角を引いて「り」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly tap the tip of your tongue against the upper gums with mouth corners stretched, like a light 'lee'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖轻弹上齿龈，嘴唇稍微突出，发音类似英文的'loo'但更轻快
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎に軽く弾いて唇を少し突き出して「る」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly tap the tip of your tongue against the upper gums with slightly protruded lips, like a light 'loo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖轻弹上齿龈，嘴巴半开，发音类似英文的'le'但更轻快
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎に軽く弾いて口を半分開けて「れ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly tap the tip of your tongue against the upper gums with half-open mouth, like a light 'leh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖轻弹上齿龈，嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似英文的'lo'但更轻快
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎に軽く弾いて口を丸くして「ろ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly tap the tip of your tongue against the upper gums with round mouth, like a light 'loh'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴巴张开，然后收拢，发音类似中文的'wa'
pronunciation_tips.ja: 口を開けてからすぼめて「わ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Open your mouth then narrow it, like 'wah'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 嘴巴呈圆形，发音类似'お' (o)，通常用作助词
pronunciation_tips.ja: 口を丸くして「お」と同じように発音するが、通常助詞として使われる
pronunciation_tips.en: Make your mouth round and pronounce like 'o', usually used as a particle

pronunciation_tips.zh: 鼻音，发音时长约一个音拍，根据后接音节变化
pronunciation_tips.ja: 鼻音で、一拍分の長さで発音し、後に続く音によって変化する
pronunciation_tips.en: Nasal sound, pronounced for one beat, varies depending on the following syllable

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，浊化发音，类似中文的'ga' (嘎)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて濁らせて「が」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate and voice it, like 'ga' in 'garden'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，嘴角拉开，浊化发音，类似中文的'gi' (吉)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて口角を引いて濁らせて「ぎ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate with mouth corners stretched and voice it, like 'gi' in 'give'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，嘴唇突出，浊化发音，类似中文的'gu' (估)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて唇を突き出して濁らせて「ぐ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate with protruded lips and voice it, like 'gu' in 'good'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，嘴巴半开，浊化发音，类似中文的'ge' (给)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて口を半分開けて濁らせて「げ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate with half-open mouth and voice it, like 'ge' in 'get'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌根接触软腭，嘴巴呈圆形，浊化发音，类似中文的'go' (锅)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌の奥を上あごにつけて口を丸くして濁らせて「ご」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the back of your tongue to the soft palate with round mouth and voice it, like 'go' in 'go'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，浊化发音，类似中文的'za' (杂)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて濁らせて「ざ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums and voice it, like 'za' in 'pizza'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接近上齿龈，浊化发音，类似中文的'ji' (吉)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎に近づけて濁らせて「じ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Bring the tip of your tongue close to the upper gums and voice it, like 'ji' in 'jeans' or 'vision'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴唇稍微突出，浊化发音，类似中文的'zu' (族)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて唇を少し突き出して濁らせて「ず」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with slightly protruded lips and voice it, like 'zu' in 'zoo'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴半开，浊化发音，类似中文的'ze' (则)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を半分開けて濁らせて「ぜ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with half-open mouth and voice it, like 'ze' in 'zebra'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴呈圆形，浊化发音，类似中文的'zo' (作)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を丸くして濁らせて「ぞ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with round mouth and voice it, like 'zo' in 'zone'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，浊化发音，类似中文的'da' (达)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて濁らせて「だ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums and voice it, like 'da' in 'dad'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 发音与「じ」基本相同，类似中文的'ji' (吉)，使用较少
pronunciation_tips.ja: 「じ」とほぼ同じ発音で、あまり使われない
pronunciation_tips.en: Pronounced almost the same as 'ji', used infrequently

pronunciation_tips.zh: 发音与「ず」基本相同，类似中文的'zu' (族)，使用较少
pronunciation_tips.ja: 「ず」とほぼ同じ発音で、あまり使われない
pronunciation_tips.en: Pronounced almost the same as 'zu', used infrequently

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴半开，浊化发音，类似中文的'de' (得)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を半分開けて濁らせて「で」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with half-open mouth and voice it, like 'de' in 'desk'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 舌尖接触上齿龈，嘴巴呈圆形，浊化发音，类似中文的'do' (多)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 舌先を上の歯茎につけて口を丸くして濁らせて「ど」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Touch the tip of your tongue to the upper gums with round mouth and voice it, like 'do' in 'door'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，浊化发音，类似中文的'ba' (吧)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて濁らせて「ば」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips together and voice it, like 'ba' in 'bat'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴角拉开，浊化发音，类似中文的'bi' (比)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口角を引いて濁らせて「び」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with mouth corners stretched and voice it, like 'bi' in 'big'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴唇稍微突出，浊化发音，类似中文的'bu' (不)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて少し突き出して濁らせて「ぶ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with slightly protruded lips and voice it, like 'bu' in 'book'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴巴半开，浊化发音，类似中文的'be' (呗)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口を半分開けて濁らせて「べ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with half-open mouth and voice it, like 'be' in 'bed'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴巴呈圆形，浊化发音，类似中文的'bo' (播)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口を丸くして濁らせて「ぼ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with round mouth and voice it, like 'bo' in 'boat'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，强送气，类似中文的'pa' (趴)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて強く息を出して「ぱ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips and release with a puff of air, like 'pa' in 'party'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴角拉开，强送气，类似中文的'pi' (批)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口角を引いて強く息を出して「ぴ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with mouth corners stretched and release with a puff of air, like 'pi' in 'pizza'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴唇稍微突出，强送气，类似中文的'pu' (扑)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて少し突き出して強く息を出して「ぷ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with slightly protruded lips and release with a puff of air, like 'pu' in 'put'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴巴半开，强送气，类似中文的'pe' (配)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口を半分開けて強く息を出して「ぺ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with half-open mouth and release with a puff of air, like 'pe' in 'pen'

pronunciation_tips.zh: 双唇轻触，嘴巴呈圆形，强送气，类似中文的'po' (坡)
pronunciation_tips.ja: 唇を軽く合わせて口を丸くして強く息を出して「ぽ」と発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Lightly touch your lips with round mouth and release with a puff of air, like 'po' in 'pop'

pronunciation_tips.zh: き和ゃ的连读，类似中文拼音'qia'的发音
pronunciation_tips.ja: 「き」と小さい「ゃ」を続けて発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Pronounce 'ki' and small 'ya' quickly together, like 'kya'

pronunciation_tips.zh: き和ゅ的连读，类似中文拼音'qiu'的发音
pronunciation_tips.ja: 「き」と小さい「ゅ」を続けて発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Pronounce 'ki' and small 'yu' quickly together, like 'kyu' in 'cute'

pronunciation_tips.zh: き和ょ的连读，类似中文拼音'qiao'的发音
pronunciation_tips.ja: 「き」と小さい「ょ」を続けて発音する
pronunciation_tips.en: Pronounce 'ki' and small 'yo' quickly together, like 'kyo' in 'Kyoto'

pronunciation_tips.en: Pronounce 'ni' and small 'ya' quickly together, like 'nya' (cat sound)

pronunciation_tips.ja: 「に」と小さい「ょ」を続けて発音する

meaning.en: (plants etc.) sprouting up one after another
